website_summaries.verdict: Melts into your skin with a rich, buttery feel and leaves you glowing.
pros: Infused with natural seaweed oils that penetrate skin for proper hydration and contain beneficial vitamins and minerals
A face lotion with staying power, you'll find a little bit goes a long way
cons: Seaweed may not provide as dramatic results as some other products

customer_reviews.title: Replaced all my other creams
customer_reviews.text: I moved from the humid south to the desert and my skin in suffering year around. Oil of Olay used to be my cream for over a decade. It worked fine until my skin became so dry that it quit working. I randomly came across a sample and am so glad I did. I used this stuff at night and now during the day under my makeup. It is amazing. I combine sometimes with Trilogy Rose Hip Oil that Kate Middleton apparently uses. So far all the batches I have ordered from Amazon have been great with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra126

customer_reviews.title: Intensely moisturizing!
customer_reviews.text: I am in my mid 50's and am diabetic. This means my skin is aging and needs hydration. This night cream is fantastic. It is thick and at first, I thought it would be greasy. Not so. It just soaks into my skin and does not leave residue on my pillow or bedding. I have started putting it on my hands, forearms, and even my feet. I also love the cleanser.
customer_reviews.author: Jane in California

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for about 2 years now and love it. That being said this was the second time I ordered it off Amazon instead of going to Ulta like I used to. And the first was sent in perfect condition, but the second one has a strange consistency to it that I don't like. It's weirdly solid in places and I've never had that problem before. I'm assuming it's a fluke since I've never had this happen before. But I love this night cream and use it every single evening.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth T

customer_reviews.title: I finally found a face cream that doesn't disappear after applying!
customer_reviews.text: The winter weather is cold and harsh on my skin. I need extra protection. T The light summer face creams aren't thick enough. I've tried many face creams and this one is a keeper. It feels fabulous when applied and it stays dewy. I've been using it every morning and evening after cleansing. I like a heavier cream and this one is excellent for me. Plus you don't use too much because it's so thick. Excellent!
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Bad batch
customer_reviews.text: I love this night cream. Decided to purchase a full size product after getting a sample from Ulta. My only complaint is that the product I received from Amazon has plastic flecks in it. The sample I used from Ulta did not have these. It package came sealed but the grainy texture is not mentioned in other reviews so I'm not sure if I got a bad batch?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: watch out for toxic ingredients
customer_reviews.text: it made me incredibly sad to see that this moisturizer has additives of food coloring so i will not be purchasing from this brand again. Absolutely no reason to put dye red, and yellow in this, i cant use it as im allergic and will break out everywhere... pity
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Probably works well for non-sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: The night cream seems to have a nice consistency and would probably do a good job for someone who isn't sensitive to chemicals. I have a problem with irritation on my lower cheekbones (not near eyes), so I'm using the cream on my hands and arms. Unfortunately, I will not be able to reorder the product..
customer_reviews.author: Weiland

customer_reviews.title: Love M. B
customer_reviews.text: Love M.B. and love this product! I'm really particular about what I put on my face because I don't like heavy products and my face gets oily easy. The Caviar Night Cream is super light and you only need a very small amount to cover your entire face. Best part is, when I wake up in the morning, my face feels amazing!!!
customer_reviews.author: MaryanneY

customer_reviews.title: I'll keep buying.
customer_reviews.text: Love this. I use it every night now and have definitely seen a difference. And it feels so smooth and luxurious. The only negative is the price; I'm not sure it's worth the price but it's the best I've found so far so I've got to suck it up.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Moisturing for my extra dry skin!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised because so far, nothing ever worked. But this one seems to be moisturizing enough until the morning I wake up. It's pretty greasy and heavy, but I guess maybe that's why it works and super moisturizing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best product for dry mature skin!
customer_reviews.text: My skin has always been dry so this stuff is exactly what it needed. It is a little greasy but I don’t mind it at all! I’m loving the dewy look. It is fantastically moisturizing and has reduced my pores. My skin looks and feels better than ever.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You'll love it too
customer_reviews.text: I just like to say I'm in love with this product just received it and already my skin feels great I've only used it once in love highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect night time moisturizer. I can still feel it on my face in the morning, provides the perfect amount of hydration. Scentless. A little goes a long way
customer_reviews.author: Hennessy Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stuff!!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this stuff. I've been using it for over a year and I just love how my face feels the next morning! A little goes a long way! I love to slather it on to the max, and I've had to buy two throughout the whole year
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Glowing skin after consistent use
customer_reviews.text: I use this lotion in the morning and night and my skin has never looked healthier. I’m 27 and trying to get a head start on tackling sun damage, so this stuff is gold. It’s greasy at first, but give it 15 minutes or so to soak into the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Skye

customer_reviews.title: I love this entire line of skin care products and I'm ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this entire line of skin care products and I'm picky about what I use on my face. It's thick but not greasy and it keeps my skin moisturized throughout the night. Makes my skin feel really smooth.

customer_reviews.title: Very thick, works great!!

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!

customer_reviews.title: Great for dry areas on body
customer_reviews.text: I use it on my cuticles, heels and elbows, targeting dry areas and it works like a charm
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Nourishing For Dry Skin
customer_reviews.text: A great product for my very dry, diabetic skin. In the morning my face still feels nourished and moisturized. Mario Badescu is a very good value, a very effective product, not as expensive as some others.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this cream but it is very thick and takes ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this cream but it is very thick and takes a couple of hours to soak in. It does make my face very soft & hydrated.

customer_reviews.title: Not for my acne ladies

customer_reviews.title: best cream for dry skin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent hydration!

customer_reviews.title: this is a great product to use

customer_reviews.author: LVH

customer_reviews.title: in love with it
customer_reviews.text: Very good night cream. I ordered the second jar already, cause it makes my skin feel soft, bright and since I'm using it my face is free of zits .

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a heavy cream best for nighttime
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a heavy cream best for nighttime, but is absorbs really well into the skin and makes your skin feel so great in the minding!

customer_reviews.title: O K

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: just the cream for night...face is still smooth and moisturized in the morning.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best product for my dry, sensitive skin. Just need a little bit. Stays hydrated all day.

customer_reviews.title: Great product

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Great product for really dry skin!
customer_reviews.text: I've heard mixed reviews about Mario Badescu products but I absolutely love them. I have severely dry skin and I have found very few products in my lifetime that keep my skin hydrated throughout the night. Warning: this stuff goes on THICK... but for someone with my skin type I love finding creams like this. I also feel like this product has staying power on my skin rather than just wiping off onto my pillowcase at night. Great stuff and I will likely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: anna dzam

customer_reviews.title: One of the best I have ever used..
customer_reviews.text: This night cream is amazing. It is light yet very thick and hydrating. I have been taking Tazorac from my dermatologist and so it is drying my skin out so I bought this night cream to help the flakiness and so far it is doing a good job. I apply the night cream with a few drops of my beauty oil and my skin feels amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Bryana Abla

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This cream is lovely - feels like silk on the skin
customer_reviews.author: Annette Wilder

customer_reviews.title: YES! GET IT!
customer_reviews.text: Finally ! a night cream that doesn't break me out! Keeps my dry skin moisturized through out the night.

customer_reviews.title: Wake up to soft silky skin!
customer_reviews.text: Have always heard of this company but never purchased. Am very glad I bought the caviar night cream. It is so moisturizing. It sinks into your skin and you wake up with soft beautiful skin. And the price is unbeatable here. At Ulta it is twice the price. Will purchase again and will try out their other products also.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca CohenTop Contributor: Health & Wellness

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if I like it
customer_reviews.text: The thing about this cream is that it stays on the surface amd doesnt get absorbed by your skin for hours. It is a night cream, which assumes that you apply it to your skin and go to bed. With this cream, unfortunately, you will end up leaving cream on your pillow.
customer_reviews.author: ElenorY

customer_reviews.title: Love Mario Badescu products
customer_reviews.text: Love Mario Badescu products. The price is great and they work wonderfully for me. This is my second purchase of this brand and I am very happy. I like the fact that this brand doesn't test their products on animals. This is very important to me.
customer_reviews.author: Thatina

customer_reviews.title: Converted to this magical night cream
customer_reviews.text: I have been a religious Dermalogica user until I decided to try this night cream. My skin adorbs the cream after 15ish minutes which is not only a good sign but also saves me the greasy and sticky feeling on my pillow. I wake up with very soft and moisturized skin, well rested and glowy.

customer_reviews.title: It's super thick and I still have it on when I ...
customer_reviews.text: It's super thick and I still have it on when I wake up. It's a decent moisturizer, but I still prefer my Olay Regenerist lotion before bed and when I wake up.

customer_reviews.title: After two weeks of using every night I was amazed by how soft and smooth my face felt
customer_reviews.text: After two weeks of using every night I was amazed by how soft and smooth my face felt. Loving it!

customer_reviews.text: I don't notice any changes in my skin so that was disappointing but I do like it when I have some dry patches of skin.

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant, rich texture
